Studio FSG

URL:

https://studio-fsg.com

Agency:

Pixel Bottom

Challenge:

To create a content managed, search engine optimised site with chat functionality and an ability to create virtual 3D exhibitions and email campaigns optimised for all devices.

Solution:

I built the site using the Artlogic platform. It is a specialist CMS for artists and galleries. It has in-built email marketing and Analytics. To create the virtual gallery I used a website called Kunst Matrix that allows you to create a virtual gallery and integrate it into the Artlogic platform.

Features:

  • ->  Site to be easily maintained and updated
  • ->  Chat functionality
  • ->  Virtual 3D gallery
  • ->  Site analytics
  • ->  Email marketing

Technology:

HTML, CSS, Artlogic, JavsScript
